title: "Goodbye, Eri" Manga. why it's so good!
description: In this blog I will give my first impressions of "Goodbye, Eri" manga. Is Fujimoto a genius?
content: I've recently bought this manga from Jarir at a decent price. I always wanted to explore different kind of manga, because I've been obsessed with JJK so much lately
